summary:
I have acquired experience in different areas working for different roles for different pharmaceutical and biotech companies, always working under GMP. Some of the acquired skills are, managing and provide leadership to manufacturing teams in order to ensure that manufacturing can be operated to optimum efficiency and in compliance with Quality Standards, manage escalation, decision making and communication within production team, lead and support investigations, technical deviations and process risk assessments, project leader for new product introduction on analytical transfers, green belt certified.

Soft Skills: Working capacity, team work, decision making, curiosity, professional experience, team/project leader.

currentPositions.description:
•	Support operational readiness for aseptic manufacturing and filling, in compliance with GMP and relevant regulatory requirements.
•	Lead and support investigations in manufacturing and technical deviations.
•	Delegate tasks and communicate priorities to team members.
•	Liaise with QC, QA, Development Scientists, CAPEX, Logistics, Supply Chain and Manufacturing to ensure adherence to schedule and efficient troubleshooting. 
•	Understand regulatory requirements associated with cell culture manufacturing and communicate them to the project and operations team.
•	Provide direction to manufacturing personnel to ensure that the manufacturing and ancillary facilities can be operated to optimum efficiency and in compliance with Quality standards, GWPs, cGMPs and all other relevant policies, procedures, regulations and standards including Health & Safety and Environmental (HSE) Legislation
•	Actively participate in problem identification, problem solving and change initiatives in cooperation with other teams and services. Continuous improvement with a cross functional focus in a core activity. 
•	Drive the implementation of Standard Work amongst team ensuring activities are coordinated and integrated (training, housekeeping, documentation, process improvements, investigation activities etc) using an inclusive planning system.
currentPositions.title: Manufacturing Manager Cell Therapy

headline: Senior People Leader~ Critical Thinking~ Lifelong Learning~GMP

message.text:
¡Hola! Estoy buscando un nuevo empleo y agradecería mucho el apoyo. Me gustaría retomar el contacto, compartir mis experiencias y ponerme al día de las novedades.

Si alguien se entera de alguna oportunidad interesante o le apetece charlar, puede enviarme un mensaje o dejarme un comentario. #OpenToWork
